titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

bioghist.p: William Jeffrey Spahr Ritscher (1886-1963) was born in Lebanon, Pennsylvania. He lived in Pittsburgh and Evanston, Illinois.

scopecontent.p: The collection contains genealogical research on the Ritscher family and allied families compiled by William Jeffrey Spahr Ritscher. The collection is organized into labeled three-ring binders. Materials include notes from published and primary sources, correspondence related to the research, family charts and information sheets on various family members, and photocopies copies from published and primary sources. There are individual binders on many different family names. There are also some original photographs and maps.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
